content_description: Promoted brand awareness for SIP mutual funds targeting first-time investors aged 22-30 in metro cities using short video reels.
Ran search ads targeting users searching for how to invest in stocks for the first time with landing page sign-up offer.
Sent personalised re-engagement emails to users inactive for 90 days offering zero commission trades for 30 days.
Pre-roll YouTube ads featuring young professionals talking about financial freedom using Groww for SIP investments.
WhatsApp campaign asking existing Groww users to refer friends in exchange for bonus brokerage credits on first trade.
Facebook carousel ads promoting top-performing mutual funds with one-tap invest button targeting working professionals aged 28-40.
Instagram story ads announcing Groww Gold ETF launch targeting users interested in alternative investments.
Search ads targeting users looking for tax saving investment options under Section 80C during January to March tax season.
